title: I'm Bastion Fennell, and I support women devs.
description: For international women's day, I will advocate for gender equality and use what privelege I have as a platform for equality.

title: Learning with Clicker Games Part 1: HTML
description: Tired of building todo apps? Try this quick introduction to web dev with idle games! This covers HTML as part one of a three part series.

title: Software Development for Humans
description: We work with humans all day everyday. I think it's time we start considering the oft ignored second end user of our code: other developers.
